definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
young fellow countryman/young person from the same village

sentences.english: This is how folks in my hometown see the world.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我們家鄉人的體驗。

sentences.english: The boss is plain from the area, also acquiesced in their home folder meat sister.
sentences.chinese: 老闆是樸實的鄉人，也就默許了妹妹夾他們家的肉喫。

sentences.english: Up the love spring very much.
sentences.chinese: 家鄉人都非常的愛春天。

sentences.english: Would you tell us the differences between people here and in your hometown?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我們講講這裏人和你家鄉人的差別嗎？

sentences.english: The noise of dogs made me a stranger here.
sentences.chinese: 狗吠聲讓我變成異鄉人，讓我止步難前。

sentences.english: Clearly he has to play to his hometown crowd.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯他只是向他的家鄉人做秀。

sentences.english: There are many things that as a stranger initially threw me for a loop.
sentences.chinese: 最初，有很多事讓我這個初來乍到的異鄉人眩暈。

sentences.english: He is a stranger in New York.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約他是一個異鄉人。

sentences.english: The stranger paused a moment in revery before this tender and calming spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 這個異鄉人在那種溫柔寧靜的景物前出了一會神。

sentences.english: When Americans discover that you are a stranger.
sentences.chinese: 當美國人發現你是一位異鄉人的時候。

sentences.english: Can become the dragon countryman I to feel extremely proud.
sentences.chinese: 能成爲龍鄉人我感到非常自豪。

sentences.english: East of the river, strangers from across the seas were seen less seldom.
sentences.chinese: 而在河東岸，狹海對面的異鄉人則少見的多。

sentences.english: And you are not a pining outcast amongst strangers?
sentences.chinese: 你沒有憔悴不堪，流落在異鄉人中間嗎？

sentences.english: Home when the rains can also be said countryman special day.
sentences.chinese: 故鄉下雨的時候也可以說是鄉人特別的日子。

sentences.english: Who dressed you, love, as a foreigner?
sentences.chinese: 是誰把你，我的情人，裝扮成一個異鄉人？

definition: old anecdote/stories passed on from former times
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
Gentlemen! (start of a speech)/Ladies and Gentlemen!
that being the case/then/in that case
make light of traveling a thousand li/go to the trouble of traveling a long distance
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

various sages/refers to the classical schools of thought, e.g. Confucianism 儒[ru2] represented by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3], Daoism 道[dao4] by Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3] and Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3], Mohism 墨[mo4] by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], Legalism 法[fa3] by Sunzi 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3] and Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子[Han2 Fei1 zi3], and numerous others
key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind
